v.v: Hear the word of Yahweh, you people of Israel.
There is cursing, lying, killing, stealing and adultery.
So the land is drying up,
But do not allow anyone to bring a lawsuit;
You priests will stumble during the day;
My people are being destroyed because of the lack of knowledge.
They feed on the sin of my people;
It will be the same for the people as for the priests:
They will eat but not have enough;
They love sexual promiscuity, wine, and new wine, which have taken away their understanding.
My people consult their wooden idols,
They sacrifice on the tops of the mountains
I will not punish your daughters when they choose to commit sexual immorality,
Though you, Israel, have committed adultery,
For Israel has behaved stubbornly, like a stubborn heifer.
Even when their strong drink is gone,
The wind will wrap her up in its wings;

v: Yahweh has a lawsuit against the inhabitants of the land,
because there is no truthfulness or covenantal faithfulness, no knowledge of God in the land.
The people have broken all bounds, and bloodshed comes after bloodshed.
and everyone living in it is wasting away;
the beasts in the fields and the birds in the sky,
even the fish in the sea, are being taken away.
do not let anyone accuse anyone else.
For it is you, the priests, whom I am accusing.
the prophets will also stumble with you by night,
and I will destroy your mother.
Because you priests have rejected knowledge,
I will also reject you as priests to me.
Because you have forgotten my law, although I am your God,
I also will forget your children.
the more they sinned against me.
They exchanged their honor for shame.
they are greedy for more of their wickedness.
I will punish them all for their practices;
I will repay them for their deeds.
they will commit prostitution but not increase,
because they have gone far away from Yahweh.
and their walking sticks give them prophecies.
For a mind of promiscuity has misled them,
and they have acted as prostitutes instead of being faithful to their God.
and burn incense on the hills,
under oaks, poplars and terebinths,
because the shade is good.
So your daughters commit sexual immorality,
and your daughters-in-law commit adultery.
nor your daughters-in-law when they commit adultery.
For the men also give themselves to the prostitutes,
and they offer sacrifices so they can commit immoral acts with sacred prostitutes.
So this people who does not understand will be thrown down.
may Judah not become guilty.
Do not go to Gilgal, you people;
do not go up to Beth Aven,
and do not swear, saying, “As Yahweh lives.”
How can Yahweh bring them to pasture like lambs in a meadow?
leave him alone.
they continue to commit adultery;
her rulers dearly love their shame.
and they will be ashamed because of their sacrifices.
